briefTitle: A Study of ProQuad in Healthy 4 to 6 Year Old Children (V221-014)
officialTitle: Administration of Frozen Measles, Mumps, Rubella, and Varicella (MMRV) Vaccine to Healthy Children at 4 to 6 Years of Age

interventions.name: ProQuad (Measles, Mumps, Rubella and Varicella (Oka-Merck) Virus Vaccine Live)

summary: The study was conducted to determine if ProQuad may be used in place of the second dose of M-M-R II routinely given to children 4 to 6 years old who were previously immunized with M-M-R II and Varivax.

primaryOutcome.measure: Antibody Response to Varicella for Subjects Who Had Previously Received M-M-R II + VARIVAX - Geometric Mean Titer
